subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brad Richards had the lone goal in a shootout after defenseman Dan Girardi, whose earlier blunder cost the Rangers a goal, scored with 2:10 left to send the game to overtime.
snippet: Brad Richards had the lone goal in a shootout after defenseman Dan Girardi, whose earlier blunder cost the Rangers a goal, scored with 2:10 left to send the game to overtime.
